---
id: search-spare-pool-assets
title: "Search spare pool assets"

sidebar_label: "Search spare pool assets"

custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Search spare pool assets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/pub/iq-modules-assets-search/v1/assets"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Queries the spare pool management service for loaner devices that satisfy the supplied filters.

**Prerequisites**
1. **Pool selection** – Call [POST /apps/sparePoolManagement/api/pools](#/Apps/listSparePools) to list available pools and capture `Id`.
2. **Custom field filters** – Review spare-specific metadata requirements (for example `IssueDate`) so you can add the appropriate `AssetCustomField` filter.

**Workflow Example**
1. Load spare pools: POST /apps/sparePoolManagement/api/pools and select the pool closest to the ticket location.
2. Search for available devices: POST /pub/iq-modules-assets-search/v1/assets with filters such as `assetsparepool`, `AssetCustomField` (IssueDate not set), and `ParentAsset` null.
3. Issue a spare: submit the selected `AssetId` to [POST /apps/sparePoolManagement/api/asset/issue](#/Apps/issueSpareAsset) along with the ticket and agent identifiers.

**Minimal Required Fields**: Filters array (must include `assetsparepool`).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Number of records to return per page.","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1},"example":10}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload submitted to search for available spare devices within a pool.","properties":{"OnlyShowDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, restricts results to deleted assets.","default":false},"Filters":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of filters that scope the spare inventory.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Filter condition applied when searching spare pool inventory.","properties":{"Facet":{"type":"string","description":"Filter facet name such as `assetsparepool`, `AssetCustomField`, or `ParentAsset`."},"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier value used by facets referencing a specific pool or asset.","nullable":true},"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Custom-field identifier when filtering by a spare metadata field.","nullable":true},"ComplexEditorPath":{"type":"string","description":"Path to the nested property within a complex custom field (e.g., `0:IssueDate`).","nullable":true},"Value":{"type":"string","description":"Raw value to compare against (supporting operators like `date<YYYY-MM-DD`).","nullable":true},"Negative":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, inverts the filter to exclude matching records.","default":false}},"required":["Facet"],"additionalProperties":false,"title":"SparePoolAssetSearchFilter"}},"FilterByViewPermission":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, the API restricts results to assets the caller can view.","default":true}},"required":["Filters"],"additionalProperties":false,"example":{"OnlyShowDeleted":false,"Filters":[{"Facet":"assetsparepool","Id":"8db57703-895a-a2d2-0896-c8a9a0360925"},{"Facet":"AssetCustomField","CustomFieldTypeId":"a7ec781d-b42d-4727-abf4-8b132f182701","ComplexEditorPath":"0:IssueDate","Value":"date<2050-01-01","Negative":true},{"Facet":"ParentAsset","Id":null}],"FilterByViewPermission":true},"title":"SparePoolAssetSearchRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
